general.ieee1284: MFG:Kyocera Mita;Model:Kyocera Mita FS-3800;COMMAND SET: POSTSCRIPT,PJL,PCL

comments.en:
Very low per-page expenses due to the permanent photo-conductor drum. Only consumables are toner and paper.
"N" model with ethernet interface available.
Use the Kyocera PPD file for PostScript, Instructions
Use ljet4 for PCL5e but PCL5e is limited to 600dpi
In case of duplex option use ljet4d for PCL5e and duplex
Using pxlmono (PCL6) may be the fastest way to get good printouts.

Maximum paper width: 8.5 inches / 21.6 cm (Standard format printer)

Printing engine speed: 24 pages/min

Consumables/Refills: Toner only, drum is permanent.
